author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: بعضی مستقلّاً گفته‌اند آنچه گفته‌اند و عاملند آنچه عاملند ای ذبیح لسان عظمت میفرماید ونفسی الحقّ قد انتهت الظّهورات الی هذا الظّهور الأعظم و من یدّعی بعده انّه کذّاب مفتر نسأل الله بأن یوفّقه علی الرّجوع ان تاب انّه لهو التّوّاب و ان اصرّ علی ما قال یبعث علیه من لا یرحمه انّه
translation: O Ḏhabíḥ! The Tongue of Grandeur saith: By Myself that speaketh the truth! In this most mighty Revelation all the Dispensations of the past have attained their highest and final consummation. Whoso layeth claim to a Revelation after Him, such a man is assuredly a lying impostor. We pray God that He may graciously assist him to retract and repudiate such claim. Should he repent, God will no doubt forgive him. If, however, he persisteth in his error, God will assuredly send down one who will deal mercilessly with him. He, verily, is the Almighty, the Most Powerful.
